AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: draft horse
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was sold to a farmer with less-than-ethical business practices, and quickly made use of [PAWN_objective] to pull the ploughs and farm equipment there. [PAWN_pronoun] broke a leg and was sold off, where he made his escape en route to who-knows-where.
